StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
To þe chyld makyngTo þe maner of leryngTo þe myht
                    of his helpyngÞorow hym þo world ys ryht holdenIn myht I
                    dyht
StPauls9Dxix.Note: Written as prose in lower margin.
StPauls9Dxix.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,  and  James Orchard Halliwell-Phillipps, eds.  
             Reliquiae Antiquae.
         2 vols. London: Smith, 1845: 1.166.
